entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers this evening and after midnight. Showers beginning after midnight. Snow level lowering to 2100 metres overnight. Local amount 5 mm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 6 May 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Showers ending in the morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm in the afternoon. Snow level 2100 metres rising to 2600 metres in the afternoon. High 14. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 6 May 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 30%
